author: wsjcom
title: Serving Clients by Empowering and Training Advisers
text:
Shannon Spotswood • President, RFG Advisory, Birmingham, Ala. • Education: B.S. in economics and political science, University of Arizona
Background: As an undergraduate Ms. Spotswood worked for former asset manager Paine Webber. After graduation she moved to San Francisco and joined EGM Capital in 1994. There, she was mentored by the company’s senior portfolio manager, an experience she says was a catalyst for her more than two-decade career in finance. Over the next 15 years, Ms. Spotswood held roles as an analyst in...
